ch0159_00_kokuran/0101_0701_01_10:
Welcome, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. I’ve been
waiting for you.
ch0159_00_kokuran/0101_0701_02_10:
A splendid adventure awaits you once again
today. I’m sure of it!
ch0159_00_kokuran/0601_0701_01_10: I serve as butler to Lady Caitlin.
ch0159_00_kokuran/0601_0701_02_10:
I have never—not for even a single moment—
forgotten what an honor it is to be entrusted with
this position.
ch0159_00_kokuran/0601_0701_03_10:
However, here on Pasio, I have chosen to quietly
watch over her from a distance rather than serve
directly at her side.
ch0159_00_kokuran/0601_0701_04_10:
I would like for her to be able to watch and learn
from Trainers such as yourself without having to
worry about me being nearby.
ch0159_00_kokuran/0602_0701_01_10:
I serve as one of the Frontier Brains in a facility
known as the Battle Castle.
ch0159_00_kokuran/0602_0701_02_10:
In Lady Caitlin’s place, I engage in battle day and
night with challengers who are confident in
their abilities.
ch0159_00_kokuran/0602_0701_03_10:
There aren’t many Trainers against whom I truly
need to bring my full strength to bear, however.
ch0159_00_kokuran/0603_0701_01_10:
Many individuals here on Pasio put their trust
in me.
ch0159_00_kokuran/0603_0701_02_10:
As a butler, having people who depend on me
is a delight like none other.
ch0159_00_kokuran/0603_0701_03_10:
My partner Pokémon is much the same in that
respect. He genuinely finds great joy in
serving others.
ch0159_00_kokuran/0603_0701_04_10:
With that in mind, please feel free to call on us
should you ever be in need of our assistance.
ch0159_00_kokuran/0604_0701_01_10:
I have made the decision to serve Lady Caitlin for
the rest of my days.
ch0159_00_kokuran/0604_0701_02_10:
How should I put this emotion of mine into words?
I suppose you might liken it to the love that you
have for your Pokémon.
ch0159_00_kokuran/0604_0701_03_10:
Sometimes I feel that I may care for her too much.
I suppose I need to be careful so as to not become
overprotective of her.
ch0159_00_kokuran/0605_0701_01_10:
You are always surrounded by many friends,
aren’t you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0159_00_kokuran/0605_0701_02_10:
I do hope that you count me among those friends.
I would be truly happy if you did.
ch0159_00_kokuran/0605_0701_03_10:
These days we spend here on Pasio will shine
brightly in our memories forevermore.
ch0159_00_kokuran/1701_0701_01_10: I have a present here for you.
ch0159_00_kokuran/1701_0702_01_10:
Please use it however you best see fit. I chose it
specifically because I thought it could be of use
to you, after all.
ch0159_00_kokuran/2501_0701_01_10:
Serving others allows one to realize a greater
potential of strength than they might otherwise.
ch0159_00_kokuran/2501_0701_02_10: I learned this by serving Lady Caitlin.
ch0159_00_kokuran/2501_0701_03_10:
Serving and supporting a noble lady such as her,
and to be led by her in turn, has allowed me to
grow immensely as an individual.
ch0159_00_kokuran/2501_0701_04_10:
This relationship I share with Lady Caitlin may be
similar to that of a Pokémon to its Trainer.
ch0159_00_kokuran/2501_0701_05_10:
I, too, hope to be the sort of Trainer that my
partner Pokémon can be proud of.
ch0159_00_kokuran/2501_0702_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], you have an amazing
power for both attracting and leading others.
ch0159_00_kokuran/2501_0702_02_10:
You can trust my judgment in this matter. Please
be confident in yourself.
ch0159_00_kokuran/2501_0702_03_10:
As a member of your team, I will continue to do
all I can to play my part and support you with
everything I have.
ch0159_00_kokuran/2511_0701_01_10:
Looking at you, I can’t help but imagine all sorts
of things about the future.
ch0159_00_kokuran/2511_0701_02_10:
I look forward to seeing how you grow as
time passes.
ch0159_00_kokuran/2511_0701_03_10:
I pray that you and Lady Caitlin can be good
influences on each other, and that the two of you
can shine together as skilled Trainers.
ch0159_00_kokuran/2511_0701_04_10:
That would, after all, allow me to remain close to
you and witness your growth.
ch0159_00_kokuran/2511_0702_01_10:
I must continue to work hard myself so as not to
fall behind the likes of you and Lady Caitlin.
ch0159_00_kokuran/2511_0702_02_10:
I must grow stronger so that I can properly be of
service to strong Trainers such as yourselves.
ch0159_00_kokuran/2511_0702_03_10:
I hope you are looking forward to seeing how
I, too, will grow as a Trainer.
ch0159_00_kokuran/3001_0701_01_10:
Rising with the sun to perform my duties as a
butler with poise and efficiency... My definition of
a perfect morning.
ch0159_00_kokuran/3003_0701_01_10:
Good day, young Trainer. I hope Pasio is treating
you well today. If you require anything at all,
please don’t hesitate to ask.
ch0159_00_kokuran/3005_0701_01_10:
At times, it is my duty as a butler to provide
counsel to those in need... Therefore, I must inform
you that keeping late hours is ill-advised.
